---
title: "About"
---

This site contains information about a workshop organised in Sreebudha College of Engineering (Autonomous) to introduce the students of fourth semester computer science to the applications of Graph Theory. This is part of the add-on program organized by the department.

## Organizors

Department of Mathematics,
Sree Budha College of Engineering (Autonomous), 
Pattoor, Kerala.
